captions.text:
Even if I 
close my eyes

I can still see 
because the wind tells me

Towards your scent where 
you walked by

Now I smile even if 
I miss you

The touch that lingered 
lives inside my heart

I cry for you in my dreams, 
hoping to see you

Where are you 
Do you know me

I cry for 
you all day

but you seemed 
not to hear my love

I send out a letter of 
my heart through the wind

That I'll be beside you
and will be waiting

Something that 
you can't control
Yes love is like that

How many times I fell down 
The wounds are slow to heal

I cry for you in my 
dreams, hoping to see you

Where are you 
Do you know me

I cry for you all day 
but your voice lingers

I miss and miss those memories 
That allows me to breath
I live on love
Dream on you

Under the same sky can 
we be together again
can we be happy again

I want nothing else but can 
you hear me in your dreams

I send out a letter of 
my heart through the wind

That I'll be beside you 
and will be waiting forever

comments.text:
I watched Dong Yi before this drama and I must say I really hated 
JangOkJeon character there but actually watching this version of history I 
feel pity for her somehow....She honestly loved the King but just took a 
wrong path to secure her position....as for Dong Yi character now I don't 
know....here she was portaied as a bad character but in the Dong Yi drama 
she was loved by a King and she also loved the king so now I can't be sure 
about her role in all this

But I really love both this dramas and will definitely watch them once 
again﻿

time you can go back and watch the rest of episodes....Revenge can be 
really scary and make even a really good person in a monster but important 
thing is that she regretted everything that she did and she knew what kind 
of a heartless person she became and regretted it in the end. This doesn't 
make up for her sins but it shows us a different perspective on life

comments.text:
Though I close my eyes, I can see you because the wind tells me
Your scent softly lingers around the steps you took before
Now…

Though I miss you, I smile
Because at the tip of my hands – no, throughout my heart,
Your lingering touch makes me live

I want to see you even if it’s in my dreams so I call out to you
Where are you? Do you even know of me?
All day, I call and call out to you
Can’t you hear it? This painful love
I send my heart along with the wind
I am by your side and I am waiting
Only for you

Things you can’t control
Yes, love is like that too
I fell down so many times
The scars don’t have time to heal

I want to see you even if it’s in my dreams so I call out to you
Where are you? Do you even know of me?
All day, I call and call out to you
Your voice lingers around me
I miss you, I miss you, your breath, those memories
They make me breathe
Again today, I live for love

Even if it’s in my dreams, if only we can be together
Under the same sky, just once more
If only we can be happy
I have nothing more to ask, even if it’s in my dreams
Can’t you hear it? This painful love
I send my heart along with the wind
I am by your side and I am waiting
Forever
﻿

Zia Even If It’s Only In A Dream Lyrics English Translation Jang Ok Jung’ 
OST

Even if I close my eyes I can see, the winds whisper to me
I follow your footsteps and to your slightly lingering scent
Now...

Even if I miss you I laugh, at my fingertips, no in my whole heart
Your touch that remains keeps me going

Even in dreams I want to see you and call for you
Where are you, do you know me
I call for you all day
But can you not hear me this aching love
I send my heart on this wind
That I'ms by your side, that I'll wait
Only for you...

There's things that I can't control
Love is one of those things
I don't know how many times I've fallen
The scars don't have time to heal

Even in dreams I want to see you and call for you
Where are you, do you know of me
I call for you all day
But your voice lingers
I miss you so much, your breath, your memories
Keep me breathing
And today I live on through love

Even in dreams if we could just be under the same sky
And be together, if we could just be happy
I could ask for nothing more, but even in dreams
I can't hear anything, this aching love
I send my heart on this wind
That I'm by your side, that I'll wait
Forever...﻿
comments.author: Anu Perera

Jung did. Their love was portrayed beautifully!
